item.description:
To celebrate (and possible cope with) the impending holiday season, this meetup will consist of some good old-fashioned writing exercises. So come ready to write and bring some of your favorites!

Additionally, as it is the time for celebration for so many of us (some of us more than others, as this will be Kate's last day at her hated job), we shall be moving the party elsewhere for karaoke afterward! Join us, won't you?
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be upstairs somewhere, either in the front or the back, vyying for space, as usual, with other Meetup groups.
item.name: Holly Jolly Writing Exercises and Jingle-Bell Karaoke
